segments.text: Hi , my name is Lean , and I'm from Russia .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Nice to meet you , Lvan.My name is Alike . I'm from Japan .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: To me English is a difficult language .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A second language is always difficult .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: True , but English is harder than most.It ' s a crazy language .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A crazy language ? Why do you say that ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: One letter can have several pronunciations and one word can have several meanings .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No wonder you say English is a crazy language .
segments.speaker: S2
